game.name: Presidential Golf
game.description:
It is time to make people of America feel proud again. Join the Presidential Golf, play some cool golf challenges along with him and help Trump to win the attention of this world again! There are exclusive and wider series of challenging and tricky holes to deal with. Trump is finding it difficult to tackle this situation on his own so he has hired you as her personal assistant. Hey friends! Do not miss this chance as you are lucky enough to play at the presidential golf course.

Go through the tutorial first before starting this brand new sports game! You would be dropped into the golf course through the presidential helicopter. Use your mouse when you play in PC or tap the screen while enjoying in the mobile phone to adjust your power and swing! Once it is done, get ready to release your ball. Try to reach the ball into the holes with the help of as minimum strikes as you can to secure 3 stars in each level in this HTML5 soccer game!

Trump will keep entertaining you by delivering some funny dialogues during the gameplay. Make sure to avoid bunkers and water hazards to stay in the game until you clear all 10 levels in this cool political satire/parody game. Guide the president to get the ball into the hole in as few swings as possible to score high in the end! After completing all 10 levels, do not forget to submit your final score to leaderboard. Good luck to play more popular titles in the category of free sports challenges and enjoy your time alone or invite your friends to have fun without download!
